## Major Release 4.0: Chronologue Mode & Timeline Intelligence

### Chronologue Mode

Visualize your story in true chronological order with the new **Chronologue Mode**. See elapsed time between scenes as arcs around your timeline, revealing the true rhythm and pacing of your narrative. Perfect for understanding story flow and identifying pacing issues at a glance.

- Elapsed time arcs show duration between scenes
- Smart tick management prevents visual clutter
- Keyboard shortcuts (1-4) for instant mode switching
- Dedicated Shift button for temporal navigation
- Dynamic scene ordering based on story time

### Intelligent Date-Time Ordering

Scenes and plots now automatically organize based on when events actually occur in your narrative, not manuscript order. Ideal for complex narratives with flashbacks, parallel timelines, or non-linear storytelling.

### Advanced Mode Control System

- Four dedicated view modes: Main Plot, All Scenes, Gossamer, and Chronologue
- Page title display shows current mode
- Lightning-fast mode switching
- Smooth rendering even with hundreds of scenes

### Enhanced Synopsis Display

- Professional date/time formatting
- Duration tracking on separate line
- Improved text positioning for all quadrants
- Context-aware text scaling

---

*Full backward compatibility maintained with all existing projects.*
